body:
NOTE: This topic shouldn't really effect my staff app for I am trying to make Avicus improve.

Let's get to it:

IvyCode
Ivy is probably the best owner ever known to mankind. But lets face it....He needs to play more. Yes, I understand he is in high school. But still, would it hurt to just get on the server for at least 5-15 minutes a day? I love what you do for us, but if you logged on more often, everyone would be happy! <3

STAFF
Best staff ever. But the thing is, we need more mods...fast. Yes, I am aware that apps have been opened, so hopefully we'll have 40 mods in no time!

The Lag
Y'all know what I'm talking about. Block lag, server lag, arrow lag, NCP, you name it! Avicus has it all. The las is so real, that on Luar, I tried the boat strategy around 7 times, and they all failed. Not because I don't know how to do it, but because of lag. I entered the boat, drove down, and right as I hit shift, my boat disappeared, I got teleported 100 blocks into the air, and died. 7 times. Yes, I know we are working on fixing this.

Suggestions
-Edit or remove NCP
- Advertising! We need more players!
-Start voting more!
-Find Youtubers to come and play!
-Hire Developers!
-Share love and have fun! >:D


That's it for today. <3
